ComicInfo.Summary:
ENTER...THE ASSASSINS GUILD!
Deadpool's adventure in New Orleans continues, and the locals want to test their might against the Merc with a Mouth!
But that ain't all - Deadpool also draws the ire of the deadliest group of killers with the word "guild" in their name - THE ASSASSINS GUILD!
And boy, are there are a LOT of them!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Bagley, John Dell & Val Staples | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Iban Coello & Matt Yackey | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:24:33. [CVDB676696]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Iban Coello, John Dell, Mark Bagley, Matt Yackey, Val Staples
ComicInfo.Characters: Bella Donna, Blackout, Deadpool, Threnody, Weasel
